page.title: 11LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: THESE ARE FEW AND MAINLY BASED ON THE SCHOOL, WHICH REMAINS THE MAIN FOCAL POINT OF VILLAGE LIFE. THE SCHOOL HOLDS COFFEE EVENINGS EVERY TWO MONTHS, AS WELL AS A CHRISTMAS CONCERT AND A HARVEST CELEBRATION. THE SCHOOL ALSO HAS A SUMMER FAIR, WHICH IS SOLELY TO RAISE FUNDS. THE PARENTAL AND VILLAGE RESPONSE IS GOOD TO VERY GOOD. THE OTHER MAIN EVENT IS THE ANNUAL CARNIVAL WEEK IN LATE JULY. THIS IS A WEEK OF COMPETITIONS, DISCOS, AND GAMES FOR YOUNG AND OLD, CULMINATING IN A CARNIVAL ON THE LAST SATURDAY. THE CARNIVAL IS LED BY THE QUEEN AND KING AND THE FAIRY PRINCE AND PRINCESS.
